title: A Letter From A Hemophiliac: Dear Lady Gaga, I've Never Drank Blood In My Life.
text:
Published By: Huffington Post Entertainment - Today 
"I'll have a cheeseburger with a cup of blood on the side," said no hemophiliac, ever. Let me start this off by saying I am not writing out ...
